title: Possessed Skull
summaries: The Possessed Skull is a pet-summoning item that spawns Skeletron Jr. to follow the player around. When the player is too far away or in midair, Skeletron Jr. will start spinning its head in order to catch up to them. The Possessed Skull has a 1/4 (25%) chance of being dropped by Skeletron in Master Mode.

statistics.Tooltip:
Summons a small Skeletron
'A skull with unimaginable power dulled.'
statistics.Sell: 5 GC
